name: Wind & Water
description:
Controls ------------------------------------------

LMB or A - Adjust wind speeds

RMB or D - Adjust water speeds

------------------------------------------------------

Help a local village produce flour and kegs for an upcoming festival using your control over the wind and water!

Wind & Water was made for...

- Mini Jam 101, with the theme of LIMIT, and the limitation of CONTROL THE ENVIRONMENT!

- Trijam 159, with the theme of CONTROL MORE THAN ONE!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
